AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Party giver
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] likes to see the smiles of others and have fun. [PAWN_pronoun] began to organize meetings and parties for everyone who wanted to have fun in the area.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Royal Guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was recruited into the Royal Guard due to [PAWN_possessive] dedication and loyalty. [PAWN_pronoun] personally guarded one of the rulers of the kingdom, accompanying her on numerous peacemaking and charity missions.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Bearer of Element of Harmony
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Once upon a time, [PAWN_nameDef] was the bearer of the Element of Harmony â€” a famous fighter against evil and an advocate for all who needed [PAWN_possessive] help. Now [PAWN_pronoun] was here with nothing.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Racist slave trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] liked no one but [PAWN_possessive] own kind of ponies. [PAWN_pronoun] began to trade in the slave trade, enslaving those who did not look like [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fanatic of Eternal Day
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the cult of the Eternal Day. The purpose of [PAWN_possessive] cult is to release the spirit of the Goddess of Light, which will immerse the world in Eternal Day.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fanatic of Eternal Night
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the cult of Eternal Night. The purpose of [PAWN_possessive] cult is to release the spirit of the Goddess of Darkness, which will plunge the world into Eternal Night.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Ritualist Magician
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] received an excellent education in the field of magical rituals. [PAWN_pronoun] was engaged in commercial activities, offering services to others.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Fighter with Windigo
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] believes that the cause of all troubles and disagreements in the world is the Windigo - ancient frost spirits feeding on the hatred of intelligent beings. [PAWN_pronoun] makes every effort to prove this to others and calls on everypony to unite for a joint struggle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Hunter of magical animals
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Despite the strict prohibition of hunting rare magical animals, [PAWN_nameDef] was engaged in poaching and subsequent collection of bloody trophies. Once [PAWN_pronoun] was caught and imprisoned, but [PAWN_possessive] hunting skills never lost.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Opponent of magic
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: One day, as a result of tragic circumstances, [PAWN_nameDef] and [PAWN_possessive] loved ones suffered greatly from the harm caused by a wandering half-educated magician. As a result, [PAWN_pronoun] became aggressive towards all wizards, despising magic in all its manifestations.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Preacher of Harmony
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a member of the Harmony promotion organization. [PAWN_pronoun] traveled a lot to different planets and communicated with various cultural communities, trying to introduce them to [PAWN_possessive] ideals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Equestriologist
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was very passionate about the ancient history of Equestria. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to achieve real mastery in this field.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cosmagic pilot
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was convicted of theft, and faced with a choice: go to jail to serve [PAWN_possessive] sentence or join the special cosmagic corps. Having little choice, [PAWN_pronoun] signed a contract for service, subsequently learning how to pilot spaceships and other heavy equipment.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cosmagic researcher
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has been wondering all [PAWN_possessive] life what is hiding there, among the distant stars? One day [PAWN_pronoun] had a unique opportunity to join the ranks of the cosmagic squad, to which agreed without hesitation.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cosmagic captain
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: As a young pony, [PAWN_nameDef] joined the cosmagic marines. Thanks to [PAWN_possessive] outstanding achievements and exemplary service, [PAWN_pronoun] quickly moved up the career ladder, eventually receiving the position of cosmagic captain.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cosmagic mechanic
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinary civilian mechanic. But when the war broke out on the planet, [PAWN_pronoun] was quickly mobilized into the space force. [PAWN_nameDef] was appointed to a specialized position, although did not have some specialized knowledge and skills.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cosmagic trader
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Being a talented negotiator and a rather enterprising pony, [PAWN_nameDef] devoted [PAWN_possessive] life to trade. Having accumulated a decent amount of capital and acquired some influential connections, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to try luck among the stars.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Cosmagic smuggler
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an ordinary employee of the space customs. Considering that [PAWN_pronoun] was being paid negligibly little, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to find additional, not entirely legitimate earnings by joining an artel of smugglers and helping them transport their goods across the border.
